entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a "fail at runtime" mechanism for better LLVMFullAOT testability #63654
  • Samplers should be allowed to modify tracestate #63652
    7.0.0
  • Add schema URL support #63651
    7.0.0
  • Add "hints" in Metric API to provide things like histogram bounds #63650
    7.0.0
  • Investigate what metrics need to be added to the runtime #63649
    7.0.0
  • Support Metrics UpDownCounter instrument #63648
    7.0.0
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #63647
  • Terminfo direct color mode does not work #63645
  • `Console.ReadKey` returns unexpected `ConsoleKeyInfo` when pressing `Shift+End` in WSL (v2 Ubuntu 20.04) #63644
  • [mono] Hot Reload: support adding instance fields #63643
    7.0.0
  • Avoid Uri creation in HttpRuleParser.IsValidHostName #63640
    Future
  • BadImageFormatException when loading valid assembly #63639
  • Configure ARM32 to panic on unligned read in CI #63638
  • DllImportGenerator tests are failing regularly on Mac #63635
  • DecompressionHandler could move the headers more efficiently #63632
  • [System.Data.Odbc] Support connection strings longer than 1024 characters #63630
  • cryptography/security test failures on RHEL9/Fedora 36. #63624
    7.0.0
  • .NET6 performance issue (compared to .NET5) #63621
  • Faster thread local statics #63619
    Future
  • Behavior of dependency resolution #63617
  • AssemblyLoadContext cannot unload DLL module in .NET 6.0 #63615
  • [wasm][debugger] ValueTypeClass refactoring #63614
  • Assertion failed 'false' in 'System.DomainNameHelper:IdnEquivalent(System.String):System.String' during 'Early Value Propagation' (IL size 127) #63610
  • Audit resource string formatting where excess arguments are passed #63607
  • System.Text.Encoding.WebName is wrong for System.Text.UnicodeEncoding and System.Text.UTF32Encoding #63605
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_val_1_r/expl_val_1_r.sh #63604
  • Test failure ConsoleEncoding.TestEncoding(inputString: \"This string has invalid surrogates \\xd800\\xd800\\xd\"...) #63603
  • Symbols for libnethost.lib not shipped #63602

Closed

  • When hosting as Windows Service, Singletons are disposed AFTER the Service has reported to be stopped #63284
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.1 - Inclusion of build\System.Text.Json.targets file in NuGet package is causing failure in WiX Heat tool #63379
  • Regex source generator should include capture group name in comment #62715
    7.0.0
  • my #63634
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message #62894
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/5/2022 2:20:03 AM #63631
  • [debugger][wasm] Check if Runtime.GetProperties works for structures with getters #63041
    7.0.0
  • TLS RVA leads to a crash #63622
    Future
  • System.MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonObjectInfoValues`1.set_ObjectCreator(System.Func`1<!0>)'. with .NET Standard 2.0 #61737
    6.0.x
  • Double quotes are escaped as \" in New JsonConsole #63554
  • [API Proposal]: Make `Lookup<TKey,TElement>` publicly constructable #62949
  • Analyzer rule CA2255 is conceptually broken and needs to be removed. #62472
  • System.IO.IOException “The parameter is incorrect” at System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister() #62192
    Future
  • .NET 6.0.101 breaks GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE/PreviewFeatures functionallity #62840
    6.0.x
  • `Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true)` does not fire `Exited` event on Windows #63328
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-103298-.NET7 #57892
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Update bbFlags after replacing RET_EXPR #63657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix a bug in the detection of Windows Nano from native test clients. #63656
    test bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update SAN test to account for OpenSSL 3 changes #63655
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Build all packages when in source-build #63653
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #63642
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary string allocation in HttpRuleParser.GetHostLength #63641
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove constraints from Regex source generator partial class declaration #63637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Skip flaky DllImport tests on Mac #63636
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [Android] Throw PNSE for unavailable network information #63633
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-maui] [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63629
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui] [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #63628
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0-maui] [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63627
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Reading beyond EOF should return 0 for FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING #63625
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Load assets earlier #63623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Improve static field access for NativeAOT #63620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #50880 remove exclusion line for collection tests #63616
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Delete `CEEInfo::IsCompilingForNGen` #63613
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix address mode for `IconHandle + Icon` #63608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Capture and record output from tests from Console.Out into the test results #63606
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1547845 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete some null checks #63024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • add capture group name in comment #63255
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Enable GC regions by default #59283
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][debugger] Fix step on ios when using interpreter #63515
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Refactor `fgDebugCheckFlags` #62948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add getter properties unfolding in structures. #63574
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix case where we fail to commit the start of a new region. #63577
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-maui] Backport MacCatalyst process start support #62520
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove leading and trailing white-spaces from section name #63549
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Update CoreShim.cpp #63600
    test bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable coreclr arm64 build #63121
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Special-case ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER in PosixSignalRegistration.Unregister #63582
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Set File Version Minor for System.Runtime.Experimental #63599
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • BackgroundService doc: improve API documentation #63011
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Use generic collections in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter implementation #63315
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Remove errors during first run of runpaltests.h #62642
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63533
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [mono] Convert RuntimeAssembly icalls to use QCallAssembly/ObjectHand… #63558
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • fix ping with SendIpHeader on FreeBSD #63531
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add blsr #63545
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63596
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [mono] Hot Reload: initial push to support adding lambdas #63513
    area-EnC-mono
  • 'cmeq' and 'fcmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugger follow up #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: yet another OSR stress mode #62980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix native frame unwind in syscall on arm64 for VS4Mac crash report. #63598
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Use "read" to fetch misaligned 64bit values from bundle header #63519
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.3
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #62773
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • improve protocol detection in jail #63565
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • Make test System.Data.Tests.AppDomainsAndFormatInfo.Bug55978 more robust #63028
    area-System.Data, 7.0.0
  • Fix escaped strings for TryGetDateTime(Offset) #63534
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing error after receiving loaded_files = null #63591
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix ArgIterator::GetArgLoc by-ref check for HFAs/HVAs #63587
    arch-arm64, area-VM-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Remove ILStrip usage in mono for source-build #63593
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Allow Delegate and MulticastDelegate marshalling #63219
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Improve auto-atomicity for Regex loops #63518
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify JIT/Methodical/eh/common and JIT/jit64/eh/common #63597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a literal after an atomic loop #63477
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.2

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable shared framework acquisition and management using workload mechanism #23377
  • Enable SDK acquisition and management using workload mechanism #23376
  • Create manifest of built-in components #23375
  • Ship built-in component types as optional workload types #23374
  • Update Workload creation to version by preview to take advantage of #22446 #23373
  • Third party workload support #23372
  • Ship ASP.NET and Windows Desktop SDK support as optional workloads #23371
  • Ship workloads out-of-band of the SDK #23370
  • Support workload upgrades via Microsoft Update #23369
  • Different behaviour in comparing IPAddress.IPv6Any to IPv6None to non .Net6 frameworks #23365
  • [Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Worker] appsettings are not nested #23364
  • With .NET 7 x86 SDK, Testhost process exited with error: It was not possible to find any compatible framework version #23362
  • Nuget package not resolved by AssemblyLoadContext.Default.LoadFromAssemblyName in NET6 with UseCommonOutputDirectory #23366
  • Install fails for rollback files if the workload only exists in an older sdk band #23361

Closed

  • Validate that AssemblyName only contains valid characters. #1078
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert to same version of System.CommandLine as 6.0.1xx. #23380
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Fix typo in CommonProperties.cs #23339
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23358
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23177
    Area-External, Area-SingleFile
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Build Single-File for Windows 7 #23336
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23347
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552
  • [Proposal]: `NotNullWhenMember` attribute #5600
  • Champion "Allow Generic Attributes" #124
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Explicit lambda return type #4934
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Enhanced #line directives #4747
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Improved interpolated strings #4487
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Improved Definite Assignment Analysis #4465
    10.0
  • Proposal: Extended property patterns #4394
    10.0
  • Proposal: record structs #4334
    10.0
  • [Proposal]: Records with sealed base ToString override #4174
    10.0
  • [Proposal] Extend with expression to anonymous type #3530
    10.0
  • [Proposal] Add ability to declare global usings for namespaces, types and aliases by using a command line switch #3428
    10.0
  • Champion "Constant interpolated strings" #2951
    10.0
  • Proposal: Allow [AsyncMethodBuilder(...)] on methods #1407
    10.0
  • Champion "CallerArgumentExpression" #287
    10.0
  • Proposal: File scoped namespaces #137
    10.0
  • Champion "Mix Declarations and Variables in Deconstruction" #125
    10.0
  • Champion "Allow no-arg constructor and field initializers in struct declarations" #99
    10.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Added notes about interpolated strings in nullable flow analysis #5550

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Struct ': this()' initializers should not have definite assignment errors #58790
  • [ENC] Edit and continue fails in method with dynamic delegate invocation #58782
  • Task list not working with VB.Net #58780
  • Add parameter null check refactoring doesn't work on record primary constructors #58779
  • [LSP] Support diagnostics requests for projection scenarios #58778
  • Add VS typescript access to LSP #58777
  • Peek Definition fails on 'new' operator #58775
  • Double click to select string results in selection outside of string #58774
  • [LSP] Move Local classification to LSP #58773
    17.2

Closed

  • Wrong output when using format specifiers inside interpolation. #58783
  • Linq expression evaluated as nullable reference #58787
  • Test plan for enhanced #line directives #54509
    17.1
  • System.InvalidCastException when using the newly introduced "Use Touple to Swap Values" in VS 17.1 to simplify usage of temp variable when swapping variables #58759
    Next
  • Incorrect override snippet for type parameter #53003
    Backlog
  • GenerateOverride should sometimes add `where T : default` constraint #53012
    Backlog
  • 'ref var' variables are incorrectly inferred to be nullable regardless of their initializers' nullability #46973
    17.1
  • Record syntax in LangVer=8 should not complain about top-level statement #45900
    17.2
  • NormalizeWhitespace causes error on XML comments #47278
    17.1
  • Difference in struct initialization causing values to be copied between 2 variables #58771
    17.1
  • IVsLanguageDebugInfo.GetProximityExpressions does not work for top-level code #58337
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test showing case no longer repros #58791
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps back to main #58789
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Backport SpillSequence Fix to 17.1 #58788
    Area-Compilers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Remove RecoverableTreeLengthThreshold option #58786
    Area-IDE
  • Perform progression search in two phases. #58785
    Area-IDE
  • Mark APIs as shipped #58776
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle more stack frames #58769
    Area-IDE
  • CA2208 Instantiate argument exceptions correctly #58768
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ide analyzer options #58765
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add tests for issues fixed by previous PR #58764
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Revert "Implement GetTypesByMetadataName" #58784
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58781
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Fix code generation to add default constraint when needed #53318
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Additional #line span directive tests #58761
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update CSharpUseTupleSwapCodeFixProvider for top-level statements #58760
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused resource string #58772
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58766
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update proximity expression tests to cover top level statements #58450
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update language feature status #58758
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58792
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • Move reading HideAdvancedMembers option up #58747
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Handle /warnaserror with Warning analyzer bulk configuration in edito… #58460
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Handle globalconfig files correctly in configuration code actions #58591
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers
  • Cover additional cases in implicit object creation analyzer #57679
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add tests for #37309 and #58472 #58752
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • [WIP] Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Integration test options #58744
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Avoid cyclic references during incremental project update #58720
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-install fails (local, CI) #39446
  • Route syntax highlighting and autocompletion #39441
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem building this repo #39440
  • Razor compiler does not produce deterministic builds #39438
  • ContentDispositionHeaderValue should always add quotes to filename #39435
  • Razor Support (`Results.Page()`, etc.) for Minimal Endpoints #39431
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Support Form binding for Minimal endpoints #39430
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Enable/Enhance response caching using Etag Filter for Minimal APIs endpoints #39429
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Explore removing inline module script for Blazor Wasm #36805
    7.0-preview1
  • ComponentHubReliabilityTest are unreliable #19666
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Flaky test: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.FunctionalTests #31464
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Optional parameter defaults in Controller Method are ignored. #38440
    7.0-preview1
  • Warnings when running a .NET 7 Blazor app #39283
    .NET 7.0
  • CSS isolation does not work when Razor runtime compilation is enabled #38889
  • Same type claims are merged when they get to the client side #39144
  • .NET 6 Blazor server app not Disposing razor pages on browser tab close #39370
  • AuthorizeView causes visible UI flashes when using a policy that awaits an async operation in .NET 6 #39386
  • New project "The remote party closed the Web Socket connection without completing the Close Handshake" #39413
  • [Feature request] [blazor] :Smarter value initialization for blazor's lifecycle #39400
  • Net Core 6 Blazor Server Hot Reload is Slow for Big Projects #32867
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Added IServiceProvider to DataAnnotationsValidator #39445
    area-blazor, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Console does not flush to chromium debugger console in Blazor MAUI #4066

  • Missing error message if the required properties are not set on the WinForms and Wpf BlazorWebView controls #4059
  • Supplying FileProvider in BlazorWebView has design flaw since it throws exception if the path doesn't exist #4058
  • RootComponentCollectionExtensions.cs is included in WinForms but missing in Wpf. #4057
  • FillRule property not working in Polygon and Polyline #4054
  • [Android] Clipping not working #4053
  • [Android] Not correctly rendering Paths #4052
  • [Android] Wrong size and layout issues using Line, Polygon, Polyline and Path #4051
  • [Windows] Animating a Shape using Device.Timer not correctly working #4050
  • [Windows] Not correctly rendering complex Paths (using multiple Paths) #4049
  • [iOS] Crash trying to launch an App using a NavigationPage #4048
  • [Windows] Incorrect rendering Path and RenderTransform property not working #4047
  • Migrate IIconElementHandler to .NET MAUI #4046
  • [Windows] Crash clipping images with different geometries #4045
  • [Windows] Not rendering Line without setting Height and Width #4044
  • CollectionView using Static property as ItemsSource is not working #4043
  • [Windows] Wrong sizes using StackLayout inside ScrollView #4042
  • CSS gradients not working #4041
  • [Windows] Incorrect RadialGradientBrush rendering #4040
  • .NET MAUI Throws Exception w/ Lib C#/WinRT #4039
  • unable to restore the packages in visual studio #4038
  • Maui-Blazor iPhone gives memory error #4037

Closed

  • Tap gestures on iOS no longer work #4001
  • Map Controls.Button.TextTransform #2986
  • Enable Remoteable Blazor UI #1603
    Blazor Backlog
  • DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfo throws element not found exception #4008
  • Unable to run wpf blazor apps via command line in c# #3874
  • Adding a new class to Platforms/Android/* in a MAUI single project adds noise to .csproj #3967

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] SwipeViewHandler #4064
  • [Housekeeping] Added CSS Brushes sample to the Gallery #4055
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • IBorder #4035

Merged

    area/controls 🎮
  • [build] don't use intermediate @(_MauiCompileToAdd) #4034

Updated

    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196

    area/controls 🎮
  • SwipeViewHandler WinUI #4026

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ServiceProviderCache keeps initially created IServiceProvider indefinitely #27169
  • Make it easier to delete properties/columns in 0-downtime scenarios #27165
  • Aggregates on multiple child tables produces invalid SQL #27163
  • SQLite Bool_not_equal_nullable_int_HasValue fails after merge from release/6.0 #27162
  • EFCore - Triggers not getting scaffolded #27161
  • Auto Migration, Database Trigger, MultiColumn Primary Key DataAnnotations, AutoColumnOrdering #27160

Closed

  • InMemory Database should apply TableNameFromDbSetConvention #27164
  • Add-Migration NullReferenceException using App.config. Failing to find config #22205
    7.0.0
  • SaveChangesAsync doesn't preserve the sync context across retries #26763
    7.0.0
  • How can I replace constans expression? #27064
  • Parentheses put around IS NULL only if operand is of type boolean (6.0) #26652
    6.0.2
  • Include for multiple entities on the same sub-level #27145
  • SQLite Database seems to maintain lock on file #27139
  • Invalid SQL generation using OwnsOne properties with .ToTable() #27126
  • EF Core InMemory Sequential Guid generation #27123
  • Use ef core in source generators #27116
  • Add a prompt y/n #27079
  • Query of the history of a temporary table returns additional records #27035
  • Shadow properties (of temporal tables) do not map values #27034
  • How to Remove and Insert Data on Middle Table together?? #27023
  • Hello all #27014
  • Update Production Database to With Migration Files #26998
  • If error occurred while saving changes, StateChanged event will not be triggered. #26989
  • sqlite + ef core #26991
  • Invalid operation exception while connecting database #26979
  • Verification of nullable in debug/release builds #26952
  • Proposal: Better exception message for "Nullable object must have a value." #26934
  • Unable to convert a queryable method to an enumerable method. #26912
  • Old cached query executing against database when using LINQ .Contains in traffic heavy environment #26905
  • SplitQuery exhausts connection pool #26899
  • SQL Server Migrations: Unable to rename or drop Table with custom schema. #26887
  • How to resolve DbContext in package-by-feature or other "vertical slice" architectures? #26447
  • EF Core does not populate subcollections in foreign key relationships in many to many tables #27149

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27167
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Tools: Use App.config on .NET Core #26752
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Test on .NET Framework #26733
  • [release/6.0] Fix baselines for IS NULL change #27166
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27159
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Update NuGet packages #26751
